p.a: Click here for updates on our extended closure including lessons

li.a: See it, Say it, Safe Line!

a.style: color: White; text-decoration: none !important; line-height: 1; margin-top: 8px;

span.strong: NEW PAGE FOR EXTENDED CLOSURE RESOURCES
We have launched an Extended Closure Resources section on our website to make it easy for our families and community to find information throughout the state-mandated closure.
Please go to this link to find the most up-to-date information

video.data-setup: { "autoplay": false, "controls": true, "muted": true, "loop": true, "loadingSpinner": true, "fluid": true, "techOrder": ["html5","flash"], "ga": {"eventsToTrack": ["start"]} }

source.p: To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

span.p: To help facilitate more efficient communication between teachers and students, we will be enabling student email accounts for students grades 6-12, beginning Monday April 6, 2020. Student email accounts will be restricted to only sending/receiving emails to/from other euclidschools.org accounts. All student email activity will be monitored for inappropriate activity.

For additional security, also beginning Monday April 6, 2020, student Google Account passwords will be changed to the same password used for accessing the Infinite Campus Portal. As a reminder, this uses the format first initial, last initial, 10 digit student number (ex. jd0001234560).
If you have technical problems with your district-issued Chromebook (problems charging, etc.), please email [email protected]
Our teachers are available to give guidance and answer questions over the extended closure. Click here to download teachers' contact information and hours of availability.

strong.span: Contact Information for ECS Administrators and Principals

span.div: We understand that you may want to reach out to our Euclid City Schools administrators and building principals with questions. Please download this form to find their email addresses.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Please read through the entire information below as it contains important information in regards to the extended school closure.

span.style: font-size: 14pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #434343; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

h3.span: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

span.style: font-size: 14pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #434343; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: For the latest information on COVID-19:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: CDC Recommendations to prevent the spread of COVID-19, influenza, and other illnesses:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Wash your hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds several times daily

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Cover your nose and mouth when coughing or sneeze into a tissue or your sleeve or elbow

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Avoid touching your eyes, nose, and mouth

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Practice Social Distancing - reduce your contact with others and large groups

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Stay home when you are sick. You should self-quarantine and contact your doctor.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: If you need to visit a doctor or other healthcare professionals, please contact them by phone so they can take adequate measures

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Information from the Cleveland Clinic

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: includes information on the virus, prevention, travel, and frequently asked questions. We encourage you to follow us on social media for updates:

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 11pt

br.p: The safety and well being of our community’s students is our highest priority during this extended school closure. To ensure Euclid’s children are well-fed during this time, the school district, along with many volunteers, will be preparing and distributing meals for every child 18 and younger beginning Monday, March 23.

span.style: color: #1c1e21; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #ffffff

p.span: Click to download more information.

a.style: color: #385898; cursor: pointer; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #ffffff

span.style: font-size: 14pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #434343; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: All district buildings and facilities, including outside facilities, are currently closed.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: School leaders have been directed not to make any exceptions, including simple access.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: All school events, travel, and extra-curricular athletics and clubs are suspended until further direction from the Governor, the Ohio Department of Education and the Ohio High School Athletic Association

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Any request for access is to be directed to Pat Higley

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Grades will be posted by Friday, March 27

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: If you have questions, please contact your child’s teacher or building principal.

span.style: font-size: 14pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #434343; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Teachers will be working from home throughout the closure. Part of their workday is to provide students with academic guidance and feedback for at-home student learning options.

li.style: list-style-type: circle; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: For information about the best time to contact your teacher see ‘Teacher Help Hours’, which will be posted online by Tuesday morning.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: While it is impossible to replicate learning at school our focus is to provide productive lessons, resources, assignments that keep students active and learning throughout the extended closure.

ul.li: If you have technical problems with your district-issued Chromebook (problems charging, etc.), please email [email protected].

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Free Internet Offer: Charter Communcations will offer free Spectrum broadband and Wi-Fi access for 60 days to households with K-12 and/or college students who do not already have a Spectrum broadband subscription at any service level up to 100 Mbps. To enroll, call 1-844-488-8395. Installation fees will be waived for new student households. Please note: Free internet is being offered but may not be available to all areas.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Another option: Some cell phone carriers allow you to use your phone as a Wi-Fi hotspot. Please contact your cell phone provider for more details.

span.style: font-size: 14pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #434343; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Instructional packets with a list of online resources will be forthcoming for students in grades spanning PK-8.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: For students with more significant needs (i.e., single classroom settings), Intervention Specialists, Speech and language Therapists and Occupational Therapists are creating academic/functional activities, daily routine schedules, and providing information on online resources as well. Additionally, parents may receive phone calls from the teacher with more individualized information.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The vast majority of EHS classes are online through Schoology and other online resources. For classrooms that do not regularly use these instructional platforms, instructional packets will be distributed.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Families with students who attend out of district placements via Euclid City Schools

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Please look for direct communication from the programs as they are preparing similar educational packets and digital academic resources for our Euclid students. Please contact Gina Rashad at

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: , Sherrell Benton or Tajuana Hunnicutt for further questions and/or concerns.

span.style: font-size: 14pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #434343; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: All IEP, ETR and Section 504 meetings will be held via phone conference or video conferencing. Your assigned Intervention Specialist or 504 chair will be in communication with parents to schedule the meetings as standard practice. Once the meetings are scheduled, a Google Invitation will be sent that will have the phone conference number or video conference link. Draft copies of the document will be sent home to families via email. If there are questions, feel free to contact your Intervention Specialist or Building Principal.

span.style: font-size: 14pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #434343; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The registration department will re-open once the school buildings are able to open. Registrations for the 19-20 school year can be completed online by visiting our

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: , however the appointment calendar will remain closed while the school buildings are closed. If you have further questions, feel free to contact Gina Rashad at

p.span: Central Office & Building Administrators

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: All central office and building level leaders will work from home through at least April 3rd. So please use their voicemail and/or email to communicate.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Construction

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The continuation of the work will be based on whether or not the construction team can maintain proper personnel. There is a concern with staffing. This will be a decision made by the state and the construction team. If our staff members are not coming into contact with the construction group, we will defer to the OFCC, the local unions and construction management staff to make that determination.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Issue 27 and Voting

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The election has been postponed. Once the State of Ohio and Board of Elections provides clarity, Citizens for Euclid Schools will provide our next steps.

div.h3: Videos to Share With Your Children

li.a: Making the Most of Change Featuring “The Story of Mr. Oak and Miss Reed”

span.br: This animated video and set of lessons provide fun-filled entertainment and hands-on enrichment to help students in grades K through 5 better manage life’s twists and turns.
These hygiene superheroes use music, humor, and hands-on activities to teach students in grades K through 5 the importance, technique, and science of proper hand washing.
